content.rendered:
Dear Parents and Students,

Welcome to TIS International Primary, Secondary & High School!

TIS is proud to be one of the pioneering international schools in Ho Chi Minh City, where many generations of students have been nurtured with knowledge, skills and values ​​to confidently step into life. The school always aims to not only train students with a solid academic foundation but also train them in ethics, physical fitness and arts, helping them develop comprehensively to become excellent global citizens.

With a comprehensive education system from Pre (for children from 3 to 5 years old) to grade 12, TIS is committed to providing a complete learning journey, suitable for each student's individual abilities and potential. The school's mission is to awaken and maximize the abilities of each individual, helping them confidently conquer their dreams, whether in Vietnam or abroad.

In addition to a team of experienced and dedicated teachers and staff, the school also invests in modern facilities and advanced technology, ensuring a healthy and loving learning environment. At the same time, the school also believes that individualized attention is an important foundation for each student to maximize their potential and achieve success when entering life.

We look forward to accompanying parents and students on the journey of discovering knowledge and building the future.

TIS, the gateway to a quality and aspirational education.

Best regards,
Dr. Le Duc Anh

excerpt.rendered: Kính gửi Quý Phụ huynh và các em học sinh thân mến, Chào mừng đến với ngôi trường Tiểu học, THCS & THPT Quốc Tế TIS! TIS tự hào là một trong những trường quốc tế tiên phong tại TP.HCM, nơi đã và đang vun đắp nhiều thế hệ học sinh với hành trang kiến […]
